sourcesContent:
<template>
	<main
		:class="['main-container', { centered: $route.name != 'searchResults' }]"
	>
		<transition appear enter-active-class="animate__animated animate__fadeIn">
			<router-view class="router-view" />
		</transition>
	</main>
</template>

<script>
export default {};
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.main-container {
	display: flex;
	flex-direction: column;
	width: 100%;
	min-height: 70vh;

	@include breakpoint(desktop) {
		.main-container {
			justify-self: center;
		}
		.centered {
			padding: 0 15em;
		}
	}
}
</style>
